description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using scheduled tasks and variable expansion of cleanmgr.exe (UACMe 34) Author: Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: UAC Bypass Using Disk Cleanup
query: (process.command_line:*\"\\system32\\cleanmgr.exe\ \/autoclean\ \/d\ C\: AND process.parent.command_line:"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\svchost.exe\ \-k\ netsvcs\ \-p\ \-s\ Schedule" AND IntegrityLevel:("High" OR "System"))
